XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="EPVisitTestSet" displayName="EPVisitTestSet" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="User.EPVisitTestSet" nullReplacement="No Data" countMeasureName="%COUNT" countMeasureCaption="# Наборов тестов" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="TestSets" displayName="Наборы тестов" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Итого" allDisplayName="Все наборы тестов" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSTestSetDR.CTTSCode" factName="DxTestSetCode" name="TestSetCode" displayName="Набор тестов (код)" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" dependsOn="[Department].[H1].[DepartmentCode]" useAsFilter="false"> </level> <level sourceProperty="VISTSTestSetDR.CTTSName" factName="DxTestSetDesc" name="TestSetDescription" displayName="Набор тестов (наименование)" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" dependsOn="[Department].[H1].[DepartmentCode]" useAsFilter="false"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="%source.VISTSTestSetDR.CTTSCode_" "_%source.VISTSTestSetDR.CTTSName" factName="DxTestSetCodeDesc" name="TestSetCodeDesc" displayName="Набор тестов" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" dependsOn="[Department].[H1].[DepartmentCode]" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Referrals" displayName="Аусорсинг" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All VISTSMoveToReferralLabDR" allDisplayName="VISTSMoveToReferralLabDR" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSMoveToUserSiteDR.CTUSLDesc" factName="DxInternalReferral" name="InternalReferral" displayName="Внутренний аутсорсинг" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не внутр. аутсорсинг" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSMoveToReferralLabDR.CTRLDescription" factName="DxSendAwayReferral" name="SendAwayReferral" displayName="Внешний аутсорсинг" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не внешний аутсорсинг" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Department" displayName="Отдел" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="Итого" allDisplayName="Итого" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,1)" factName="DxDepartmentCode" name="DepartmentCode" displayName="Отдел" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Обычный" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,2)" name="DepartmentName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Priority" displayName="Приоритет" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="Итого" allDisplayName="Итого" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" displayName="Приоритет" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetPriorityTestSet(%source.VISTSPriorityDR,%source.%ID)" factName="DxPriority" name="TestPriority" displayName="Приоритет" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="UserDetails" displayName="Пользователь" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All VISTSUserSiteDR" allDisplayName="VISTSUserSiteDR" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSUserEnteredDR" factName="DxUserEntryResult" name="UserEntryResult" displayName="Пользователь, записавший результат" description="Пользователь, записавший результат" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="VISTSUserEnteredDR.SSUSRName" name="UserEntryResult" displayName="Пользователь, записавший результат" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSUserAuthorisedDR" factName="DxUserAuthorization" name="DoctorAuth" displayName="Пользователь, авторизовавший результат" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="VISTSUserAuthorisedDR.SSUSRName" name="DoctorAuthorizationName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H3" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSUserReasonDR" factName="DxUserCancelTestSet" name="UserCancelTestSet" displayName="Пользователь, отменивший набор тестов" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="VISTSUserReasonDR.SSUSRName" name="UserCancelTestSetName" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="true" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H4" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSUserSiteDR.CTUSLDesc" factName="DxUserSite" name="TestUserSite" displayName="Местоположение пользователя" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Не определено" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="CollectionDate" displayName="Дата взятия материала" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All VISTSDateOfCollection" allDisplayName="VISTSDateOfCollection" sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllDateTimeForTestSet,1)" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxCollectionYear" name="CollectionYear" displayName="Дата взятия: Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxCollectionMonth" name="CollectionMonth" displayName="Дата взятия: Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxCollectionDay" name="CollectionDay" displayName="Дата взятия: День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="CreationDate" displayName="Дата регистрации" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All VISTSDateOfCreation" allDisplayName="VISTSDateOfCreation" sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllDateTimeForTestSet,3)" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxCreationYear" name="CreationYear" displayName="Дата регистрации: Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxCreationMonth" name="CreationMonth" displayName="Дата регистрации: Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxCreationDay" name="CreationDay" displayName="Дата регистрации: День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="AuthorisationDate" displayName="Дата авторизации" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All VISTSDateOfAuthorisation" allDisplayName="VISTSDateOfAuthorisation" sourceProperty="VISTSDateOfAuthorisation" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="false"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxAuthorisationYear" name="AuthorisationYear" displayName="Дата авторизации: Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxAuthorisationMonth" name="AuthorisationMonth" displayName="Дата авторизации: Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxAuthorisationDay" name="AuthorisationDay" displayName="Дата авторизации: День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="DateAuthorisationService" displayName="Дата авторизации услуги" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateAuthorisationService" allDisplayName="DateAuthorisationService" sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetDateOfAuthorisationService(%source.%ID,%source.VISTSSuperSetDR,%source.VISTSDateOfAuthorisation)" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxDateAuthorisationServiceYear" name="DateAuthorisationServiceYear" displayName="Дата авторизации услуги: Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxDateAuthorisationServiceMonth" name="DateAuthorisationServiceMonth" displayName="Дата авторизации услуги: Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxDateAuthorisationServiceDay" name="DateAuthorisationServiceDay" displayName="Дата авторизации услуги: День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Services" displayName="Услуги" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="All Services" allDisplayName="Все услуги" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,5)" factName="DxServiceCode" name="ServiceCode" displayName="Код услуги" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" dependsOn="[Services].[H2].[DepartmentCodeService]" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,6)" factName="DxServiceDescription" name="ServiceDescription" displayName="Наименование услуги" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" dependsOn="[Services].[H2].[DepartmentCodeService]" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,3)" factName="DxDepartmentCodeService" name="DepartmentCodeService" displayName="Отдел услуги" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Нет данных" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,4)" name="DepartmentNameService" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="ReasonCancelTestSet" displayName="Причина отмены набора тестов" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All CancelTestSet" allDisplayName="CancelTestSet" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="VISTSReasonDR.CTRDescription" factName="DxReasonCancel" name="ReasonCancel" displayName="Причина отмены" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="DateCancelTestSet" displayName="Дата отмены набора тестов" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateCancelTestSet" allDisplayName="DateCancelTestSet" sourceProperty="VISTSDateOfReason" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level factName="DxDateCancelTestSetYear" name="DateCancelTestSetYear" displayName="Дата отмены: Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxDateCancelTestSet" name="DateCancelTestSetMonth" displayName="Дата отмены: Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level factName="DxDateCancelTestSetDay" name="DateCancelTestSetDay" displayName="Дата отмены: День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="AuxiliaryData" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All AuxiliaryData" allDisplayName="AuxiliaryData" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,10)" factName="DxPatientCode" name="PatientCode" displayName="Пациент: код" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="false"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$piece(%source.%ID,"||",1)" factName="DxEpisodeNumber" name="Episode" displayName="Номер эпизода" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="false"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H3" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,14)" factName="DxContainers" name="Containers" displayName="Номера контейнеров" description="Список номеров контейнеров для этого набора тестов или код типа образца или "?"" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="false"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="FlagAbnormal" displayName="Результат не в норме" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All FlagAbnormal" allDisplayName="FlagAbnormal" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,9)" factName="DxFlagAbnormal" name="FlagAbnormal" displayName="Результат не в норме" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Нет" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceExpression="%source.VISTSMoveToUserSiteDR'=""" factName="MxInternalReferral" name="NumberInternalReferrals" displayName="# Внутренний аутсорсинг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="true" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="%source.VISTSMoveToReferralLabDR'=""" factName="MxSendAwayReferral" name="NumberSendAwayReferrals" displayName="# Внешний аутсорсинг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="true" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="%cube.GetNotReferred(%source.%ID)" factName="MxInHouseReferral" name="NumberInHouse" displayName="# Обработано в лаборатории" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="true" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllDateTimeForTestSet,7)" factName="MxTurnAroundTime" name="TurnAroundTime" displayName="ТАТ, мин" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetPortionEpisode(%source.%ID)" factName="MxPortionEpisode" name="PortionEpisode" displayName="Кол-во эпизодов (нецелое)" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" scale="12" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,8)" factName="MxPrice" name="Price" displayName="Сумма услуг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" scale="2" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,7)" factName="MxQServices" name="QServices" displayName="Количество услуг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,15)" factName="MxQTests" name="QTTests" displayName="Кол-во тестов" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,16)" factName="MxQTTestsNoCalc" name="QTTestsNoCalc" displayName="Кол-во невычисляемых тестов" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="$li(%expression.AllInfoForTestSet,9)="Да"" factName="MxQTAbnormal" name="QTAbnormal" displayName="# Наборов не в норме" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" formatString="#" iKnowSource="string"></measure> <relationship sourceProperty="VISTSParRef" factName="RxEpisode" name="EPVisitNumber" displayName="Данные по эпизоду" disabled="false" relatedCube="EPVisitNumber" cardinality="one"></relationship> <expression sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetAllDateTestSet(%source.%ID,%source.VISTSDateOfCollection,%source.VISTSTimeOfCollection,%source.VISTSDateOfReceive,%source.VISTSTimeOfReceive,%source.VISTSDateOfCreation,%source.VISTSTimeOfCreation,%source.VISTSDateOfAuthorisation,%source.VISTSTimeOfAuthorisation)" name="AllDateTimeForTestSet" disabled="false"></expression> <expression sourceExpression="##class(TCBI.UtilsRu).GetAllInfoTestSet(%source.%ID,%source.VISTSSuperSetDR.CTSSCode)" name="AllInfoForTestSet" disabled="false"></expression> <calculatedMember name="TATPercentile90" displayName="ТАТ: Центиль 90%, мин" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.Percentile","PERCENTILE",1,"%measure","TurnAroundTime","%percentile","90","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="TATPercentile75" displayName="ТАТ: Центиль 75%, мин" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.Percentile","PERCENTILE",1,"%measure","TurnAroundTime","%percentile","75","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="TATMediana" displayName="ТАТ: Медиана, мин" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.Median","MEDIAN",1,"%measure","TurnAroundTime","%percentile","50","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="AverageCreationDay" displayName="Среднее кол-во наборов тестов за календ. день по дате доставки" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.AverageDay","AVGDAY",1,"%measure","%COUNT","%dimension","DxCreationDay","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="AverageCollectionDay" displayName="Среднее кол-во наборов тестов за календ. день по дате забора материала" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.AverageDay","AVGDAY",1,"%measure","%COUNT","%dimension","DxCollectionDay","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="AverageAuthoriseDay" displayName="Среднее кол-во наборов тестов за календ. день по дате авторизации" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.AverageDay","AVGDAY",1,"%measure","%COUNT","%dimension","DxAuthorisationDay","%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="QTPatients" displayName="Кол-во пациентов" description="Количество пациентов" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="COUNT([AuxiliaryData].[H1].[PatientCode].Members,EXCLUDEEMPTY)" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="QTEpisodes" displayName="Кол-во эпизодов" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="COUNT([AuxiliaryData].[H2].[Episode].Members,EXCLUDEEMPTY)" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="QTContainers" displayName="Кол-во образцов" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="%KPI("%DeepSee.QTContainers","QTContainers",1,"%CONTEXT")" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="listEpisodes" displayName="Список заявок" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="%ID"></listing> <listing name="listingWithPrice" displayName="Первичные данные с ценой услуги" disabled="false" listingType="table" sql="SELECT source.VISTS_ParRef as Episode, source.VISTS_TestSet_DR as TestSet, source.VISTS_TestSetCounter as Npp, ext.Price As Price FROM $$$SOURCE, TCLEx_Data.EPVisitTestSetExt ext WHERE $$$RESTRICT AND source.VISTS_RowId=ext.EPVisitTestSetExt_RowId"></listing> <listing name="listEpisodes2" disabled="false" listingType="table" sql="SELECT source.VISTS_ParRef as Episode, source.VISTS_TestSet_DR as TestSet, source.VISTS_TestSetCounter as Npp FROM $$$SOURCE, SQLUser.EP_VisitTestSet WHERE $$$RESTRICT "></listing> </cube>

Method.name: GetNotReferred
Method.Implementation: s returnVal=0 s obj=##class(User.EPVisitTestSet).%OpenId(id,0) i obj d . i obj.VISTSMoveToReferralLabDR="",obj.VISTSMoveToUserSiteDR="" d . .s returnVal=1 Quit returnVal
